chapter.title: Overview of DITA-Aware Tools
chapter.shortdesc: The set of commercial and open-source DITA-aware tools is constantly growing. This chapter provides an overview of the different types tools available and then, for each type, the well-established tools in that category.

p.draft-comment: Discuss the different types of tools and so on.

subsection.title: Authoring Tools (Editors)
subsection.shortdesc: Tools whose primary purpose is the creation and modification of DITA documents.

subsection.title: Processing Tools (Processors)
subsection.shortdesc: Tools whose primary purpose is the production of some new result from DITA documents, as typified by the DITA Open Toolkit.

subsection.title: Component Management Systems (CMSes)
subsection.shortdesc: Tools whose primary purpose is the storage and management of DITA documents in order to support authoring and processing for distributed teams.
